home.title: What Birthday Gift to Give?
home.subtitle: Recommend the most thoughtful birthday gifts for you
home.footer: Solve your "gift anxiety" and make every gift full of heart 💝
home.description: Just a few minutes, tell us about the recipient's basic information and interests

questionnaire.title: Tell Us About the Gift Recipient
questionnaire.description: A few simple questions to help you find the most thoughtful gift

hints.child: 🧒 Recommend safe, educational gifts for children
hints.teen: 🧑‍🎓 Recommend trendy, tech gifts for teenagers
hints.young: 👨‍💼 Recommend practical, personalized gifts for young adults
hints.middle: 👨‍💼 Recommend quality, health-focused gifts for middle-aged
hints.senior: 👴 Recommend health, comfort gifts for seniors

interests.label: Interests & Hobbies
interests.inputPlaceholder: Enter interests, press Enter to add
interests.addMoreHint: 💡 Add more interests for more accurate recommendations

types.INTP: Thinker - Innovative inventors with unquenchable thirst for knowledge
types.ENTJ: Commander - Bold, imaginative and strong-willed leaders
types.ENTP: Debater - Smart and curious thinkers who cannot resist an intellectual challenge
types.INFJ: Advocate - Quiet and mystical, yet very inspiring and tireless idealists
types.INFP: Mediator - Poetic, kind and altruistic people, always eager to help a good cause
types.ENFJ: Protagonist - Charismatic and inspiring leaders, able to mesmerize their listeners
types.ENFP: Campaigner - Enthusiastic, creative and sociable free spirits
types.ISTJ: Logistician - Practical and fact-minded, reliable and responsible
types.ISFJ: Defender - Very dedicated and warm protectors, always ready to defend their loved ones
types.ESTJ: Executive - Excellent administrators, unsurpassed at managing things or people
types.ESFJ: Consul - Extraordinarily caring, social and popular people, always eager to help
types.ISTP: Virtuoso - Bold and practical experimenters, masters of all kinds of tools
types.ISFP: Adventurer - Flexible and charming artists, always ready to explore new possibilities
types.ESTP: Entrepreneur - Smart, energetic and very perceptive people, truly enjoy living on the edge
types.ESFP: Entertainer - Spontaneous, energetic and enthusiastic people - life is never boring around them

budget.label: Budget Range
budget.budgetHint: 💰 At this price range, we'll recommend

pastGifts.label: Gifts Given Before
pastGifts.inputPlaceholder: Enter past gifts, press Enter to add
pastGifts.hint: 💡 Tell us about gifts you've given before, we'll avoid duplicates and suggest fresh ideas!
pastGifts.successHint: ✨ Great! We'll avoid recommending these types and provide more novel choices

seasons.spring: Spring: Flowers, outdoor gear, light clothing
seasons.summer: Summer: Sunscreen, cool drinks, outdoor equipment
seasons.autumn: Autumn: Warm items, fall fashion, cozy accessories
seasons.winter: Winter: Warm items, hot drinks, indoor entertainment

questionnaire.mbtiHint: 💡 Skip this option if you're unsure about MBTI type

results.title: Gift Recommendation Results
results.recommendationSubtitle: Based on the recipient's characteristics, we recommend these {{count}} thoughtful gifts

blessing.title: Personalized Birthday Blessing 💝
blessing.subtitle: Add a warm blessing to this special gift
blessing.usage: 💌 You can write this blessing on a card or send it to the recipient

tip.title: Helpful Tip
tip.content: These recommendations are tailored based on the recipient's personal characteristics. You can adjust according to actual circumstances and personal preferences. The most important thing is your thoughtfulness! Remember to include a warm blessing with your gift~

footer.main: 🎁 Hope these recommendations help you find the perfect birthday gift!
footer.sub: Remember, the best gift is your thoughtfulness 💝
